version_description:
- Graphics have been enhanced for high-resolution displays.
- The speed of graphic drawing processes has been significantly improved.
- iCloud support has been added.

- Graphics have been enhanced for high-resolution displays.
- The speed of graphic drawing processes has been significantly improved.
- iCloud support has been added.

!!IMPORTANT!!
Please note the following regarding the latest update:
[iCloud Save Data Compatibility]
- iCloud save data from the previous version (ver. 1.2.0) is incompatible with the latest version (ver. 2.0.0). Please save the game using the in-game save feature before updating to the latest version.
[Quick Save Warning]
- Quick Save data from the previous version cannot be used in the latest version.
* Please use the in-game save feature before updating to the latest version.
- Due to OS feature changes, Quick Save cannot be performed in battles in the latest version.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience and understanding.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience and understanding.
The crash at launching the application occurred on certain devices has been fixed on this version.
